metadata.title: CVE-2024-1312 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernel's Memory Managementsubsystem when a user wins two races at the same time with a fail in themas_prev_slot function. This issue could allow a local user to crash thesystem.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-1312` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

No subscription required
